lexUnit.name: sob.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an act or sound of sobbing.

sentence.text: The tears welled up in her eyes and trickled into her ears and down her neck ; she heard her own sobs but made no effort to contain them .
For some time the only sound in the room was that of her choking sobs and his comforting murmur as he continued to tenderly stroke her hair .
Jenny gave a convulsive sob and lay back in her pillows again .
She gave a slight sob as they came towards her , her eyes wide with fear .
Deep racking sobs that shook her whole body .
This seemed to quieten Oliver ; his screams died down into long , big sobs that made him shake all over .
Covering his own face with his hands , he was overtaken by silent sobs that made his shoulders shake .
Kate 's shoulders were heaving under great sobs that racked her body .
Emotion welled up inside her , and with a strangled exclamation she turned her face into the pillow and wept , great shuddering sobs which hurt her chest .
With a stifled sob Perdita stumbled upstairs , slamming the door so hard that every ornament in the house shook .
It was a sob of relief -- she knew she was finally safe ; then the cries turned to ones of anguish .
Sobs from within the unlit bedroom .
There was an appalled silence in the room , broken by a choked sob from Georg , who suddenly ran out of the door .
The only sound in the house is the occasional last convulsive sob from the top of the stairs .
The message arrived fractured by noisy , ugly sobs .
He Held her breathlessly tight and she felt his body shake with deep sobs .
Muted sounds emerged between his tearing sobs , but no more articulate words .
His breathing turned into ragged sobs , his hands slickening with blood as he pulled at the loose dead weight of Saunders ' body .
With a hiccuping sob , Terry rolled over and sat up .
Kirov spoke quietly , his voice choked by irregular sobs .
Uttering a strangled sob , she turned back into the thicket .
Patrick could hardly bear to listen to her throat-tearing sobs .
" Melissa began but Eleanor paid no heed as wave after wave of pent-up fear poured out between her sobs .
The racking sobs did n't last long ; she was too afraid that fitzAlan would recover and come after her .
A dry sob broke from the man 's lips before he brought himself back under control .
Long shuddering sobs shook her slight frame as she poured out her hurt and misery .
Lucy 's sobs stilled a little and she clung to Jay .
